content: Peyman Afshani's homepage Home Publications Peyman Afshani Associate Professor Center for Massive Data Algorithms Contact: peyman a t madalgo.au.dk Alternate Contact: peyman.afshani a t gmail.com My research interests include: Discrete and Computational Geometry Algorithm and Data Structures (mostly related to above) Combinatorics and Combinatorial Problems (again mostly related to the above) This is the list of my publications.
